alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 21 at 8:20AM CDT until June 22 at 8:41PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS... At 32.0 feet, Flood water crosses River Road, County Road 320 near River Walk Gardens. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 29.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is cresting this morning and is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 10.0 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 29.9 Wed 8 am CDT 22.7 14.4 11.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CDT.
